title: Trying Out a New Product!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Hey, did you know that the vending machine on our way home has a new product?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh? No, I didn’t....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s called mango milk, and it’s only available for a limited time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I can’t really imagine it. It must be rare, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Right? So umm, Maki-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Stop looking at me like that. You’re definitely going to ask me something, aren’t you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Can we buy and share the mango milk?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I knew it.... Geez, I guess it can’t be helped.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu. Thank you, Maki-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Since we’re going to buy one, we might as well get Rin on this too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
